properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT MEMBER_NO ,MEMBER_ID ,MEMBER_NAME ,MEMBER_NICKNAME ,MEMBER_EMAIL ,MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE ,MEMBER_GRADE ,STATUS FROM MEMBER) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_GRADE = ? ,STATUS = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT MEMBER_NO ,MEMBER_ID ,MEMBER_NAME ,MEMBER_NICKNAME ,MEMBER_EMAIL ,MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE ,MEMBER_GRADE ,STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
